items.title: Retired UFC Veteran Turns To Boxing, Signs With Eddie Hearn
items.description: Molly McCann signs with Matchroom Boxing after retiring from MMA, aiming for a fast rise in women’s boxing with title aspirations on the horizon.

items.title: UFC Veteran Announces Retirement 2 Days Before Her 30th Birthday
items.description: Cheyanne Vlismas retires from MMA to focus on motherhood, leaving behind a promising UFC career and a powerful message on priorities.
